content:
HEALTH EQUITY & DISPARITIES
IN A 21st CENTURY PANDEMIC
To both register and participate in one or all of these multi-campus conversations, please click here (or by visiting: https://bit.ly/3nx20il )
After registering, you will receive future notices about each upcoming conversation as the event approaches, along with a  Session link to join the discussion.

As a reminder, this is a three-campus conversation, please feel free to invite your colleagues and students from your campus and community members who might be interested in or benefit from these conversations.
